abilities.name: Siege Captain
abilities.rule: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a **MONSTER**, **VEHICLE**, or **FORTIFICATION** unit, improve the Strength, Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics of that attack by 2.

abilities.name: Signum Array
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[IGNORES COVER]** ability.
